row.process: :SET &SCRI# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) :PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# :SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&SCRI#, "echo START") :SET &FILES# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.REGISTERED_OUTPUTFILES,"&AGENT#,&LOGIN#,*") :PROCESS &FILES# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&FILES#,1) : SET &FILE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&FILES#,2) : SET &EXPIRE_DATE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&FILES#,5) : SET &CURR_DATE# = &$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD# : IF &CURR_DATE# >= &EXPIRE_DATE# ! : PRINT "DELETE FILE &FILE#" : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &DELCMD# = 'DEL /F "&FILE#"' : CASE "UNIX" : SET &DELCMD# = 'rm -f "&FILE#"' : OTHER : ENDSWITCH : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&SCRI#, &DELCMD#) : DELETE_VAR VARA.REGISTERED_OUTPUTFILES,&KEY# : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &FILES# :SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&SCRI#, "echo END") :SET &OUTDIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_JOBREPORT',&$AGENT#) :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &DELSCR# = "&OUTDIR#DEL.&$RESTART_RUNID#.bat" call &DELSCR# : CASE "UNIX" : SET &DELSCR# = "&OUTDIR#DEL.&$RESTART_RUNID#.sh" . &DELSCR# : OTHER :ENDSWITCH :SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&SCRI#,&DELSCR#,&$AGENT#, &$LOGIN#,OVERWRITE) :REGISTER_OUTPUTFILE "&DELSCR#","N"
